price: 63. ¿Nos equivocamos al burlarnos de ellos en la tierra o (están aquí y) no los hemos visto?”.
arabic: أَتَّخَذۡنَٰهُمۡ سِخۡرِيًّا أَمۡ زَاغَتۡ عَنۡهُمُ ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرُ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: attakhadhnāhum sikh'riyyan am zāghat ʿanhumu al-abṣāru
